hello: Welcome. A few things before we start: Please type your answers into one message (don't send several messages). Pleae do NOT send 'likes' or gifs and always select options when given. The chat will naturally come to an end. At the end of the chat you will get the prolific completion code. If the chatbot for some reason stops replying, please just send your prolific ID and end the chat. This chat does not work on the Messenget Lite app. All good?
yes

Great! I will present you with reasons why you should consider reducing your meat consumption. You can either agree or disagree. If you disagree, I am interested why you don't agree with them. Are you ready?
yes
Awesome. Please tell me what applies most to you: 1: I definitely wouldn't 2: I probably wouldn't 3: I might 4: I probably would 5: I definitely would consider reducing my meat consumption
Please tell me what you are more concerned about: the impact that meat consumption has on your health, or the impact it has on the environment and animals?.

Okay. What is the main reason you eat meat?
